amendment.description: To make available, from amounts appropriated for Research, Development, Test, and Evaluation, Air Force, $5,000,000 for X-43C development.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3536 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 3536 proposed by Senator Stevens for Senator Talent. (consideration: CR S7381; text: CR S7381) To make available, from amounts appropriated for Research, Development, Test, and Evaluation, Air Force, $5,000,000 for X-43C development.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3536 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3536 proposed by Senator Stevens for Senator Talent.
